                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an authorized Credential object.
        Parameters:
        HTTP_TRANSPORT - The network HTTP Transport.
        Returns:
        An authorized Credential object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the credentials.json file cannot be found.

                                      java.lang.String recurrence)
        Updates a specific meeting with new features
        Parameters:
        calID - the id of the calendar with the event to be updated
        meetingID - the specific meeting to be updated
        newMeeting - the meeting to replace the old meeting
        Returns:
        the html link to the newly updated calendar event

      • inviteAttendee

        public com.google.api.services.calendar.model.Event inviteAttendee(java.lang.String calID,
                                                                   com.google.api.services.calendar.model.Event event,
                                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> newAttendees)
                                                            throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                                                   java.io.IOException
        Invites any number of attendees to a given event
        Parameters:
        calID - the calendar id for the calendar on which the event takes place
        event - the full event object that invites are being sent to
        newAttendees - a string list of the emails of new attendees
        Returns:
        the newly updated event, with more invitees
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        java.io.IOException
